title: Low water to cause early closure of state boat ramp on Rogue River reservoir
text: BING NEWS: Low water to cause early closure of state boat ramp on Rogue River reservoir The dry season in southern Oregon has caught up with Lost Creek Lake and Marina, where the clerk at the store said Thursday she expects the boat launch at Joseph H. Stewart State Park will close this weekend due to low water.
